mapper.insert: INSERT INTO danmu( id, songId, userId, content, createdAt ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{musicId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.songId musicId, a.userId userId, a.content content, a.status status, DATE_FORMAT(a.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d %T') createTime FROM danmu a WHERE a.id = (SELECT MIN(b.id) FROM danmu b WHERE b.status = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.songId = #{musicId, jdbcType=BIGINT}) FOR UPDATE
